attributes.action: Begin testing on arrival at all UK airports before Christmas
attributes.additional_details: It is a matter close to my heart, being a British expatriate living in the UAE. Having not seen family for over a year now, we are remaining hopeful that testing on arrival and shorter quarantine will be standard practice before Christmas to enable families to reunite.
attributes.background: Allow UK citizens the opportunity to test for Coronavirus on arrival in or before departure to the UK to cut quarantine time and allow them to see family during the Christmas period

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551550
